alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 2:08PM EDT until June 09 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... East central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/. * At 207 PM EDT/107 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Wewahitchka, or 15 miles east of Callaway, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Chipola Cutoff, Willis Landing and Dalkeith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
